org.springframework.messaging.rsocket

接口 RSocketRequester.Builder

  • 封闭接口:
    RSocketRequester

    public static interface RSocketRequester.Builder
    Builder to prepare an RSocketRequester by connecting to an RSocket server and wrapping the resulting RSocket.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Connect to the RSocket server with the given ClientTransport.

      Connect to the RSocket server over TCP.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<RSocketRequester> connectWebSocket(URI uri)
      Connect to the RSocket server over WebSocket.

      Configure the MimeType to use for payload data.

      Configure the MimeType to use for payload metadata.

      Configure the ClientRSocketFactory.

      Customize the RSocketStrategies.

    • 方法详细资料

      • dataMimeType

        RSocketRequester.Builder dataMimeType(@Nullable
                                      org.springframework.util.MimeType mimeType)
        Configure the MimeType to use for payload data. This is then specified on the SETUP frame for the whole connection.

        By default this is set to the first concrete MimeType supported by the configured encoders and decoders.

        参数:
        mimeType - the data MimeType to use

      • metadataMimeType

        RSocketRequester.Builder metadataMimeType(org.springframework.util.MimeType mimeType)
        Configure the MimeType to use for payload metadata. This is then specified on the SETUP frame for the whole connection.

        At present the metadata MimeType must be "message/x.rsocket.routing.v0" to allow the request route to be encoded, or it could also be "message/x.rsocket.composite-metadata.v0" in which case the route can be encoded along with other metadata entries.

        By default this is set to "message/x.rsocket.composite-metadata.v0".

        参数:
        mimeType - the data MimeType to use

      • rsocketFactory

        RSocketRequester.Builder rsocketFactory(Consumer<io.rsocket.RSocketFactory.ClientRSocketFactory> configurer)
        Configure the ClientRSocketFactory.

        Note: This builder provides shortcuts for certain ClientRSocketFactory options it needs to know about such as dataMimeType(MimeType) and metadataMimeType(MimeType). Please, use these shortcuts vs configuring them directly on the ClientRSocketFactory so that the resulting RSocketRequester is aware of those changes.

        参数:
        configurer - consumer to customize the factory

      • rsocketStrategies

        RSocketRequester.Builder rsocketStrategies(@Nullable
                                           RSocketStrategies strategies)
        Set the RSocketStrategies to use for access to encoders, decoders, and a factory for DataBuffer's.

      • rsocketStrategies

        RSocketRequester.Builder rsocketStrategies(Consumer<RSocketStrategies.Builder> configurer)
        Customize the RSocketStrategies.

        By default this starts out with an empty builder, i.e. RSocketStrategies.builder(), but the strategies can also be set via rsocketStrategies(RSocketStrategies).

        参数:
        configurer - the configurer to apply

      • connectTcp

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<RSocketRequester> connectTcp(String host,
                                                         int port)
        Connect to the RSocket server over TCP.
        参数:
        host - the server host
        port - the server port
        返回:
        an RSocketRequester for the connection

      • connectWebSocket

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<RSocketRequester> connectWebSocket(URI uri)
        Connect to the RSocket server over WebSocket.
        参数:
        uri - the RSocket server endpoint URI
        返回:
        an RSocketRequester for the connection

      • connect

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<RSocketRequester> connect(io.rsocket.transport.ClientTransport transport)
        Connect to the RSocket server with the given ClientTransport.
        参数:
        transport - the client transport to use
        返回:
        an RSocketRequester for the connection
